text:
Hosanna, Hosanna,
Hosanna in the highest! (2)
Lord, we lift up Your name


With our hearts full of praise;
Be exalted, oh Lord, our God,
Hosanna in the highest!

Glory, Glory,
Glory to the King of kings! (2)
Lord, we lift up Your name
With our hearts full of praise;
Be exalted, oh Lord, our God,
Glory to the King of kings!

e Carl Tuttle
